topic.title: VISUAL INSPECTION CONFIRMED NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS DURING LAPAROTOMY INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, VISUAL INSPECTION CONFIRMED NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS DURING LAPAROTOMY INDICATOR is reported when the PATIENT undergoes a laparotomy based on the result of an Abdominal X-Ray.
